name: President Hotel
features: Large private garden reserved for hotel guests.

name: O' Two Hotel
features: Rooftop terrace with an outdoor pool flanked by sunloungers.
This high end hotel is 1 km from the V&A Waterfront along the South Atlantic Ocean, 2 km from Two Oceans Aquarium and 23 km from Cape Town International Airport.

name: Bliss Boutique Hotel
features: We have two spectacular viewing decks, one just outside our bar where you can relax in a hammock-chair and sip on a sundowner, the other on the roof where you can enjoy Table Mountain in all its glory.
Your room card allows you access to our private beach.
We offer on site secure parking.
